pit_table_params

table for trace and time information

Database Fields
ptp_id

Primary key, together with PTP_PARAM_NAME

ptp_pse_id

Severity of the entry, either TRACE- or DEBUG_LEVEL

ptp_log_date

Date of the row creation

ptp_param_name

Name of the parameter, Primary key, together with PTP_ID

ptp_param_value

Parameter value, limited to 4000 byte
